title.narrative: Support to the Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR) - 2011 to 2015

description.narrative: This activity (Support to the Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR) - 2011 to 2015) is a component of Support to the Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR) - 2011 to 2015 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £12,500,000. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Sectors not specified. , with the following implementing partners: Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR). The start date is 01-04-2011 and the end date is 31-03-2015.
